one of the redeeming features of any warrior ethic; and of the sundry value=
s held by sundry warrior societies, it's one of those I think most importan=

between.
This is not to dispute your history - I'm not such a fool as that =
- but to reiterate the importance I feel that bunbu ichi carries through to=
 the present day.
Thanks again.
      Gereg
